title: HC0-HC901-COMMUNITY HEALTH CLINICS
description: Community Health Clinics  Over the next 6 years the Department of Health plans to build 7-10 new community health clinics located in Wards 6, 7 and 8. The clinics will be located in middle and high schools and will serve the community at large, including infants, children, families, and seniors.
